texts.description: A locally-hosted AI agent (OpenAI-compatible) fine-tuned with your organization’s unique culture, values, competencies, and HR policies. Acts as a personalized digital coach for every employee, strategic advisor for HR, and continuous ally in talent development and performance management.

facilities.title: Culture & Competency-Aware AI
facilities.description: Trained exclusively on your values, competencies and internal policies

facilities.title: Personalized Coaching Journeys
facilities.description: Tailored development plans and real-time feedback for each employee

facilities.title: Smart Goal & OKR Alignment
facilities.description: Automatically links individual objectives to company strategy

facilities.title: Instant Career & Skill Recommendations
facilities.description: Proactive suggestions based on performance, aspirations and gaps

facilities.title: Full Conversation History & Traceability
facilities.description: Complete audit trail of every interaction and recommendation

facilities.title: On-Premise & 100% Data Secure
facilities.description: Runs locally – your data never leaves your infrastructure

texts.description: Our OpenAI-compatible agent is fine-tuned with thousands of internal documents, performance reviews, competency frameworks and real conversations from your organization. It speaks your language, respects your rules and accelerates talent development like never before.

features.title: Real-Time Personalized Guidance
features.description: Answers questions, suggests actions and coaches 24/7 in natural language

features.title: Performance & Potential Insights
features.description: Identifies high-potentials, skill gaps and succession candidates instantly

features.title: Leadership & Feedback Coaching
features.description: Helps managers give better feedback and run more effective 1:1s

features.title: HR-Ready Reports & Analytics
features.description: Generates compliance-ready summaries and development dashboards

texts.description: Real impact organizations are achieving today with their private AI coach.

services.title: Succession Planning
services.description: Instant identification of ready-now candidates and development roadmaps

services.title: Learning & Development
services.description: Personalized training recommendations aligned with business needs

services.title: Manager Enablement
services.description: Real-time coaching for better conversations, feedback and team leadership

services.title: Employee Experience
services.description: 24/7 support for career questions, policy clarification and growth

services.title: Engagement & Retention
services.description: Early detection of flight risk and proactive retention strategies

services.title: Culture Carrier
services.description: Reinforces your values and behaviors in every single interaction
